attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fed up of rising costs, high flood of immigrants, powers being handed to Europe, no straight answers and want immediate action before it's too late.

Make your voice heard and lets do something about it rather than read it in the newspapers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
